job_title: AI Email Nurture Agent – n8n + Supabase + OpenAI
description:
Overview:
We're Odyssey Projects – a marketing tech company building a scalable AI-powered lead nurturing engine for service businesses.

We're seeking a smart, reliable dev or automation specialist to build a modular AI agent in n8n that:

Generates personalised email sequences using OpenAI

Tracks and adapts to lead behaviour (booking, no-show, etc)

Works across multiple clients with different tones and goals

Can plug into any CRM (we use GoHighLevel internally, but want CRM-agnostic flexibility)


The Mission – v1 Build Scope:
Build a single endpoint (POST /nurture-agent/v1/send) that:

Accepts lead data via webhook (from GHL or another CRM)

Generates a custom nurture email using OpenAI (GPT-4)

Returns the email OR sends it directly via Postmark/SendGrid

Logs the interaction in a memory layer (Supabase)

Tracks conversion (booking status) and stops nurture sequence on success

Optionally transitions to booking reminders and no-show handling


What We’ve Already Got:
✅ n8n self-hosted (running cleanly)

✅ Supabase (lead memory + client config)

✅ Pinecone minimally set up (happy to scale this)

✅ GoHighLevel workflows (but we want this system to run externally)

🧠 Clear idea of the nurture logic, tone shifting, and lifecycle steps


Ideal Experience:
Strong experience with n8n workflows (must)

OpenAI API + GPT prompt design

Supabase or Postgres for memory/state management

Familiarity with CRMs like GoHighLevel, HubSpot, etc

Experience with webhook-based flows and scalable endpoint builds


Nice to Have:
Worked on AI agents, lifecycle marketing, or sales automation

Familiar with email sending APIs (Postmark, Mailgun, SendGrid)

Experience building “multi-tenant” or client-specific logic


Deliverables for v1 (First Milestone):
Functional, well-structured n8n flow

/nurture-agent/v1/send endpoint

Supabase config table for multi-client setup

Clean documentation (inputs, outputs, how to scale)

Logging + memory working


What Success Looks Like:
We can plug in a new client with minimal config

AI emails feel tailored and outcome-driven (based on prompts + client tone)

Leads stop being messaged once they book or convert

The system can grow into post-call or onboarding flows


Budget:
Open to fixed price or hourly depending on your approach. Looking for someone who can think critically and advise on architecture too – not just build to spec.


To Apply:
Share examples of n8n or AI workflows you've built

Briefly explain how you'd approach v1 of this agent

Let us know if you’re comfortable setting up the memory logic + feedback triggers

job_title: AI n8n Workflow Engineer
description:
Job Title: AI Workflow Engineer
Reports To: Operations Manager (interim) or Head of AI & Automation
Type: Part-Time (10–15 hours/week, scalable with workflow demand)
Direct Reports: None initially – potential oversight of junior automation contractors
Location: Remote

About The Company:
Lucerna is a fast-scaling video marketing agency helping financial firms attract high-value clients through inbound systems. Our mission is to systemize content strategy and automate backend processes using cutting-edge AI tools, enabling client growth while reducing team workload. As we build the foundation for a scalable and intelligent agency, we are hiring a technical workflow engineer to help build and maintain the backend automation infrastructure that powers our operations.

Position Summary:
The AI Workflow Engineer will design, test, and maintain internal automation systems that accelerate the creation and delivery of client work. You'll collaborate with the Client Success Manager, editors, and leadership to streamline onboarding, fulfillment, and reporting using tools like OpenAI, n8n, Airtable, and Notion. Your work will directly impact our efficiency, client experience, and ability to scale with minimal friction.

This role is ideal for a systems thinker and builder who enjoys solving operational bottlenecks using AI and automation. You’ll own the technical side of automation while documenting everything for repeatability and continuous improvement.

Key Responsibilities:
1. AI Workflow Development
- Build and deploy AI-powered systems to automate deliverables like onboarding assets, video scripts, and performance reports
- Integrate tools including n8n, OpenAI API, Airtable, Notion, Slack, and Google Workspace
- Design modular automations for use across multiple client accounts

2. Fulfillment Systemization

Automate generation of:
- Client onboarding assets (emails, folders, forms)
- VSL outlines/scripts based on onboarding inputs
- SEO metadata (titles, tags, descriptions)
- Performance and content tracking reports
- Standardize output formatting, naming conventions, and data sync

3. QA & Troubleshooting
- Ensure outputs meet quality standards before handoff to editors or clients
- Debug workflow failures and performance drift
- Maintain low system failure rate with proper testing and contingency logic

4. Documentation & Logging
- Maintain detailed documentation for each automation (inputs, outputs, triggers, dependencies)
- Keep all systems organized and easy to replicate or update
- Support the development of AI SOPs and internal knowledge base

5. Internal Collaboration
- Work with CSM to identify automation opportunities across client accounts
- Assist editors with AI templates and frameworks

job_title: Your Instant Hyper Targeted Engaged Audience by Chat
description:
# **Your Instant Hyper Targeted Engaged Audience by Chat**

**Revolutionary AI-powered conversation platform that finds your perfect customers by mining conversations and intelligent network learning - no ads, no guesswork, just guaranteed relevant connections.**



## **Project Overview**

**Nexy** is the AI-native workspace that unifies every way we work and talk - capturing, mirroring, and perfecting all collaboration to drive shared goals 10× faster.

We're building **Nexy Connect** - the customer acquisition module within this comprehensive platform that revolutionizes how businesses find their perfect audience by mining conversations across the workspace network and creating hyper-targeted connections in real-time.

**How it works:** When someone needs customers, Nexy Connect immediately starts casual conversations with network users to identify and pre-qualify perfect matches before making introductions.

## **Real-World Examples**

**Example 1: SaaS Startup**
Request: "Find me 5,000 small business owners struggling with inventory management"
Nexy Connect Action: Starts conversations about business challenges → "What's your biggest operational headache?" → Identifies inventory pain points → "Have you tried digital solutions?" → Pre-qualifies tech readiness → Delivers qualified leads ready for demo

**Example 2: Local Service Business**  
Request: "Find me 500 homeowners in Amsterdam planning kitchen renovations"
Nexy Connect Action: Casual conversations about home improvement → "Any renovation projects coming up?" → Identifies kitchen plans → "What's your timeline and budget?" → Confirms location → Delivers warm leads with timeline and budget intel

**Example 3: Educational Course**
Request: "Find me 2,000 professionals wanting to learn data science"
Nexy Connect Action: Discusses career development → "What skills would boost your career?" → Identifies data/analytics interest → "Have you considered formal training?" → Assesses learning commitment → Delivers motivated students ready to enroll

**Example 4: Personal Connection**
Request: "I'd love to meet someone who shares my passion for rock climbing and lives nearby"
Nexy Connect Action: **Learns from YOUR chats** (you mentioned climbing gear, weekend plans, favorite routes) → Asks others "Do you enjoy outdoor activities?" → "Ever tried rock climbing?" → "What's your experience level?" → Confirms location and interest → Finds compatible climbing partner with similar skill level

## **Bidirectional Learning**

**The Intelligence Works Both Ways:** Nexy Connect doesn't just ask others about your needs - it continuously learns from YOUR conversations with Nexy to understand your preferences, lifestyle, and personality, creating richer matches for both business and personal connections.

When you chat about weekend plans, travel experiences, or hobby frustrations, Nexy builds your profile to help others find YOU when they need someone with your interests, skills, or characteristics.

## **Core Innovation**

**Conversation Mining Engine:** Nexy Connect analyzes existing chat patterns and strategically initiates natural conversations that start broad and narrow down organically while learning preferences for ALL related use cases simultaneously.

**Real-Time Intelligence:** Every conversation triggers intelligent background learning across the network, building comprehensive user profiles that serve infinite future connection scenarios.

**Network Effect Amplification:** Each interaction strengthens the entire ecosystem - conversations about kitchen renovations simultaneously build knowledge for home services, real estate, interior design, creating exponential value for all users.

## **Key Deliverables**

- **Conversation Trigger Engine:** Auto-detects relevant users and initiates natural learning conversations based on chat history
- **Progressive Question Logic:** Smart conversation trees that adapt in real-time while maintaining natural flow  
- **Knowledge Aggregation System:** Real-time matching with 70%+ confidence scores and weighted relevance algorithms
- **Connection Orchestration:** Seamless user experience with context-rich introductions and learning loop optimization

## **Target Market**

**Global SMBs and individuals:** Students seeking study partners, freelancers needing clients, families finding local services, churches connecting communities, sports clubs growing membership. Accessible pricing for mass market adoption with premium features for business users.

## **Technical Requirements**

**Existing Infrastructure Integration:** Build on current SaaS platform and infrastructure. Focus on core conversation engine, matching algorithms, and user interface integration rather than ground-up development.

**Fixed-Price Development:** Complete feature set with defined scope, deliverables, and success metrics. No scope creep, clear milestone payments.

**Timeline:** **1-month MVP delivery** leveraging existing platform capabilities and infrastructure.

**Tech Stack Requirements**

Integration with existing backend, conversation management system, AI/ML API integration (OpenAI/Anthropic), matching algorithm implementation, user interface enhancements for connection orchestration.

We want someone who sees technology as an extension of their own ambition: a partner who stays ahead of the trends, communicates clearly, and loves the challenge of building what hasn’t been done before. Most of all, you’ll have the stability of a long-term relationship, a team that values your vision, and a role that grows with you.

job_title: Build a No-Code MVP: Lead Gen Chatbot, Client Dashboard & Automation
description:
Hello,

I am looking to hire an experienced no-code developer to build a complete Minimum Viable Product for a B2B business. The goal is to create a sophisticated lead generation and management system for a specific niche: senior living communities.

This is not just a simple chatbot request. I need a freelancer who can build a complete, end-to-end system using a specific stack of no-code tools to deliver a seamless experience for my future clients.

The entire workflow has been mapped out, and I need an expert to execute the vision efficiently and professionally.

Core Deliverables & The System Workflow:
The final product will be a complete system comprised of four interconnected parts. The desired user flow is as follows:

A potential customer visits one of my client's websites and interacts with the chatbot.
The chatbot guides them through a series of qualifying questions.
Upon completion, the lead's information is automatically sent to a central database.
The lead instantly appears in a private, secure web dashboard for my client to view.
My client receives an automated email notification about the new lead.
To achieve this, you will be responsible for building and integrating the following:

1. The Intelligent Chatbot

Tool: Voiceflow
Function: This is the customer-facing part. It needs to be more than a simple Q&A bot. It must follow a specific, guided conversational script to qualify leads by asking questions about their needs, timeframe, and contact information. I will provide the finalized script and conversation logic.

2. The Central Database

Tool: Airtable
Function: You will set up a clean, organized Airtable base to serve as the database. It will need separate tables for Leads, our Clients (Facilities), and potentially Conversations. This will be the single source of truth for the entire system.

3. The Secure Client Dashboard

Tool: Softr.io
Function: This is the core of the client-facing product. You will build a simple but professional web portal where my clients can log in securely.
Crucial Requirement: Each client must only have access to their own leads. You will need to properly configure the multi-tenancy/user permissions in Softr based on the Airtable data to ensure complete data privacy between clients. The dashboard will display a list of leads and allow the client to click into each one to see details and the full chat transcript.

4. The Automation

Tool: Make.com (formerly Integromat)
Function: You will create the necessary automation scenarios in Make to connect the entire system. This includes:
Taking the data from a completed Voiceflow conversation.
Creating a new lead record in the correct Airtable table.
Triggering a formatted email notification to the client.
What I will provide:
A finalized, detailed script for the Voiceflow chatbot conversation.
Access to all necessary accounts (Voiceflow, Airtable, Softr, Make.com).
Clear feedback and prompt communication throughout the project.

Ideal Freelancer Qualifications:
Proven experience building functional MVPs using the specific tools listed: Voiceflow, Airtable, Softr, and Make.com. Please do not apply if you are not an expert in this stack.
A portfolio of past projects that includes client dashboards, chatbot development, or complex automation.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to a non-technical founder.
A problem-solving mindset and the ability to work independently to deliver a polished final product.

Project Scope & How to Apply:
This is a fixed-price project. Please provide a quote for the entire end-to-end system as described above.

To show you have read this description in detail, please start your proposal with the phrase: "No-Code MVP Expert".

In your proposal, please briefly outline your approach and share 1-2 examples of similar systems or dashboards you have built. I am looking to hire quickly and begin work as soon as possible.

Thank you for your time. I look forward to seeing your proposals.

job_title: Full-Stack Developer for E-commerce Platform
description:
We're looking for an experienced full-stack developer to help build our e-commerce platform. 
        The project involves:
        - Building a React frontend with modern UI/UX
        - Developing a Node.js/Express backend API
        - Integrating with Stripe for payments
        - Setting up automated inventory management
        - Creating admin dashboard for order management
        
        Must have experience with:
        - React, Node.js, MongoDB
        - Payment gateway integration
        - E-commerce platforms
        - API development
        - Automation tools
        
        This is a 2-3 month project with potential for long-term collaboration.
